name: poison-jab
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is stabbed with a tentacle, arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.
